title: Cakes: basic techniques
brief_description: Illustrates and explains the step by step procedures for baking a variety of cakes from ‘scratch’. Shows shortened cake, one-pan mixing, angel food cake, cream cheese frosting, seven minute frosting anf fruit glaze.
description: Illustrates and explains the step by step procedures for baking a variety of cakes from ‘scratch’. Shows shortened cake, one-pan mixing, angel food cake, cream cheese frosting, seven minute frosting anf fruit glaze.
